title: "“Gowajee” - a Thai Speech-Recognition AI from Chula"
excerpt: "Chula Engineering professors have designed “Gowajee”, a Thai-language speech recognition AI with the accuracy of a native speaker that keeps users’ data secure – now rolled out in call centers, and being used for depression patients screening."
